snippet: New Zealand, the world champion, will play the United States on Nov. 1 at Chicago’s Soldier Field, 34 years since they last played a match on American soil.
lead_paragraph: New Zealand, the world champion, will play the United States on Nov. 1 at Chicago’s Soldier Field, 34 years since they last played a match on American soil.

headline.main: New Zealand to Play U.S. in Chicago
headline.print_headline: New Zealand to Play U.S. in Chicago
